title: Patent Patrol: Is SRAM eTap wired on the horizon?
content:
As Shimano flirts with its own wireless drivetrain, SRAM appears to be heading in the opposite direction. In today’s Patent Patrol, SRAM has filed a patent to add wires to its eTap components. That’s right, eTap Wired could be in the works. Why would SRAM want to do that? It’s all about the size of […]

The post Patent Patrol: Is SRAM eTap wired on the horizon? appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Dan Cavallari
